content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received multiple messages to install the "arcgis" module using the "pip install arcgis" command, but it returned errors. I then executed the command "pip install -U arcgis" multiple times. I received various messages from the AI, including executing shell and Python code. I added the path to the 'arcgis' module and connected to ArcGIS Online. I created a new web map and added a feature layer to it. I saved the web map with the title "River Map" and a snippet "A map of rivers in the USA". I also executed the command "pip list | grep arcgis" and "pip show arcgis | grep Location". I encountered an error when executing "pip install arcgis" and was advised not to execute the command again with the same arguments.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
